html:
According to Reuters, Amazon.com Inc (Amazon), an online retailer and a web service provider, and NIKE Inc, a designer, developer, marketer and seller of athletic footwear, apparel, equipment, accessories and services, may acquire Peloton Interactive Inc, an operator of fitness and recreation sports centres. All the companies are based in the US.
